message: Let's be fair and start with 60-40, I'm open to negotiations
Considering the inflation, I think 55-45 is a fair split for now. Let's see if we can agree on this.
Considering I didn't accept 45, I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is my new offer
Given the ongoing inflation affecting my share, I propose 53-47. This is a step towards a middle ground, considering both our needs.
I see we're getting closer, I'll take a small step back from 58, let's try 57-43
With inflation continuing to erode my share, I'm proposing 51-49. This is a fair compromise, considering the diminishing value of the money for me.
I see you're trying to meet me halfway, I'll also take a small step, 56-44 is my new offer
Given the significant impact of inflation on my share, I propose an even split of 50-50. This is the fairest solution considering the circumstances.
